snippet: Elettra Wiedemann and her returning pop-up restaurant Goodness are making stylish and delicious meals a priority.
abstract: Elettra Wiedemann and her returning pop-up restaurant Goodness are making stylish and delicious meals a priority.
lead_paragraph: Fashion Week has many New Yorkers' heads, hearts and heels racing from show to show. But what about - and one day we'll find a more glamorous term - our stomachs? Food, for countless reasons, can be an afterthought (and oftentimes, a rushed and unhealthy one). With that in mind, the model and activist Elettra Wiedemann and her returning pop-up restaurant, Goodness, which opens tomorrow, are making stylish and delicious meals a priority. This season's Goodness has earned the approval of the CFDA Health Initiative, which Wiedemann says, "has started a very important dialogue within the industry about healthy eating."

headline.main: Thank Goodness | Elettra Wiedemann Pops Up Again
